TopicTitle: [1.0.X] KTwitter 1.1 EARLY BUILD - tweet from your vessel and add reality to your space program

Articles.Content:
**THE PLUGIN IS WORK IN PROGRESS, SO FEEL FREE TO COMMENT THIS THREAD TO TELL ME WHAT YOU WANT TO SEE IN THE MOD** 
![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**KTwitter** is a plugin that allows sending tweets from your vessel. You can access to a simple interface and post a new tweet from manned missions. The hashtags, @... stuff and tweet messages are randomly chosen in the mod database. You also earn a little amount of caused donation and reputation once the tweet is posted. You can access to the last posted tweet (partially working).

**Planned features :**

*Features in* *green* *have been implemented in v1.1, and features in* *orange* *are currently WIP*

- Small pictures next to the tweet;
- Save Settings options;
- More RP features (favourite tweets);
- EVA tweeting supported;
- More accurate tweets;
- Better language syntax in rare cases;
- French language implementation

EDIT: okay, since it is no twitter-client-mod for ksp (why not? could be fun...), forget my ideas.
